mapper.select: select (case when job = 1 then '班主任' when job = 2 then '讲师' when job = 3 then '学生主管' when job = 4 then '教研主管' when job = 5 then '咨询师' else '其他' end) pos, count(*) total from emp group by job order by total
select if(gender = 1, '男性员工', '女性员工') name, count(*) value from emp group by gender
